Production Co: Liman Film, Gloria Films, 4 Film, Circe Films, Match Factory Productions, Ay Yapim, Horsefly Productions
Synopsis: Emre, a young and dedicated prosecutor, is newly appointed to a small town hit by a water crisis and political scandals. After an initial welcome, he experiences an increasing number of tense interactions and is reluctantly dragged into local politics. When Emre forms a bond with the owner of the local newspaper pressure escalates under heated rumors.
Title: Burning Days
